comments:

This is for a consuming product that leverages deployment functionality beyond that used by the base TPTP test types.
I probably won't be able to address this during 4.2.1 construction (as I will be on vacation starting tomorrow), but will attempt to fix it before 4.2.1 GA.

Using the TPTP Agent Controller (and IBM JRE), I have been unable to reproduce this problem.  I have run the consuming product at a fairly high stress level, and have seen files over 100 MB transferred successfully without this error (albeit very slowly.)  We need to compare base TPTP AC with the AC used by the consuming product in this test to verify if the problem lies in the enhanced AC.
